title: Health and Go
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Mediterranean, Salad bar, Take-out, Fusion, Spanish, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A take-away kind of lunchroom with some seating, located in the business area of town. Menu offers a few vegan choices like millet balls in almond sauce, seitan sauteed with leek, tofu with green curry and vegetables. Owner is open to accommodating vegan requests.
